oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relish dish and tongs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Silver and glass relish dish and tongs from the family of Richard England. The silver is plated with designs and the glass is engraved with a woman and cherub. "Middletown plate" is engraved on the bottom of the silver plate. Family legend states that the dish was hidden in a well for safekeeping during the Civil War.
